personalInfo.splInterest: Fishing, travel, playing guitar, watching movies

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt / 21st qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: 2011: Made three cuts in 12 starts on the Web.com Tour, with a T25 at the Midwest Classic his best finish during the year. 2008: Made three of four cuts on the Web.com Tour. 2007: Finished T20 at the Wyndham Championship, his only made cut on the PGA TOUR...Made one of two cuts on the Web.com Tour. 2006: Missed the cut at the U.S. Open. Played on the eGolf Tour, Gateway Tour and Atlantic Tour and won several times on each.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Two-time All-Southern Conference selection in 2003 and 2004. Won twice at University of North Carolina-Greensboro in 2004 and held the school record for a 54-hole score...Graduated from Pinecrest High School in Southern Pines, NC, and was a four-time Southeastern 4-A Conference first-team selection.
tourBios.personal: Cites a T20 finish in the 2007 Wyndham Championship, his second career TOUR start, as his biggest thrill in golf...Lists Andrew Rice as an instructor...Never travels without his sunglasses and cell phone...Favorite golf course is Oakmont CC and would like to play Augusta National, St. Andrews and Pebble Beach. Favorite college team is North Carolina State and pro team is the Carolina Panthers. "Family Guy" is his favorite TV show, "The Hangover" is his favorite movie and Five People You Meet in Heaven is his favorite book. Brad Paisley is his favorite entertainer. Tiger Woods and Michael Jordan are his favorite athletes to watch. Favorite food is Mexican. Favorites cities to visit are Las Vegas, Houston and Nashville...Uses a quarter from the 1960s to mark his ball...Would put Woods, Jack Nicklaus and Arnold Palmer in his dream foursome...Bucket list includes visits to Alaska and Yellowstone National Park and learning to fly an airplane...Has one brother.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour in 2012 is T17th at the Mexico Open Presented by Banamex.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 82nd in Heat Index(Finish)-last 4 evts on the Web.com Tour.
